review: Side effects- metallic taste in mouth, nightmares, insomnia, constipation, stomach pain, gas, fatigue. Stay the course despite all the difficult side effects this medication has cleared up my ear infection. Iâ€™m currently on day 9 of a 10 day treatment.
I did not have any problems taking Biaxin ! It worked really fast !

I was put on Biaxin because of an inner ear infection. I'm on my fourth day of taking this medication. Sure there were some side effects but it worked. I couldn't hear out of my left ear for almost 3 weeks and on day four of taking this med I'm seeing results. The results outweigh the side  effects that's for sure.  I didn't think anything would work so I'm very pleased that Biaxin did!

I was put on Biaxin 3 days ago for sinus infection, bronchitis, ear infection and upper respiratory tract infection, and have the most horrible taste in my mouth. The 1st night I got up several times just to brush my teeth to get rid of the taste. I called the Doctor today and he is calling in something else.
